description.h2: The name attribute of an xsd:element must not equal any xsd:element name attribute in a standard taxonomy.
description.p: It is not necessary to compare the @name attribute to all element declarations in all standard taxonomy schemas. Only those schemas that are present in the DTS of a specific instance being validated are relevant.
REMARK: Only edgartaxonomies.xml defines "standard taxonomy" for purposes of this test.

variation.name: 6.7.16, custom element not a duplicate, GOOD.
variation.description: custom element not a duplicate, GOOD.

variation.name: 6.7.16, custom element a duplicate of 2008 dei tag, used in instance, NOGOOD.
variation.description: custom element a duplicate of 2008 dei tag, used in instance, NOGOOD.

variation.name: 6.7.16, custom element a duplicate of 2008 dei tag, not used in instance, but nevertheless NOGOOD.
variation.description: custom element a duplicate of 2008 dei tag, not used in instance, but nevertheless NOGOOD.

variation.name: 6.7.16, extension e6071600_Top is a duplicate only of non-standard element edgar_Top, GOOD.
variation.description: extension e6071600_Top is a duplicate only of non-standard element edgar_Top, GOOD.

variation.name: 6.7.16, extension e6071600_NY is a duplicate of an element in stpr standard taxonomy but stpr is not in the DTS, GOOD.
variation.description: extension e6071600_NY is a duplicate of an element in stpr standard taxonomy but stpr not in the DTS, GOOD.

variation.name: 6.7.16, KY appears as element name in sptr and country in the same DTS but they are standard taxonomies, GOOD.
variation.description: KY appears as element name in sptr and country in the same DTS but they are standard taxonomies, GOOD.
